text: Tamilnad Mercantile Bank has contributed Rs.2 crore to the Chief Minister’s Flood Relief Fund, M. Gunasekaran, General Manager, Business Development, said in a release on Wednesday. H.S. Upendra Kamath, Managing Director and Chief Executive Officer, handed over the demand draft to Chief Minister Jayalalithaa on Wednesday. Bank directors A. Rajakumar and P. Mahendravel were present.
title: TMB gives Rs. 2 crore for flood relief
